dcterms:description: Human demonstrations collected for the Atari 2600 games Pong, Freeway, and Beamrider. Each game was played five rounds, with game frames, actions, rewards, and terminal states recorded.
dcterms:title: Human Demonstrations for Atari Games

dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: The Arcade Learning Environment (ALE) provides a suite of Atari 2600 games for reinforcement learning research. It includes various games and allows for evaluation of agents in different environments.
dcterms:title: Arcade Learning Environment (ALE)
